label: Oriental Rugs and Textiles
description: Market category for oriental rugs and textiles, including traditional and modern styles from various regions.
intents: Find and purchase oriental rugs and textiles
Learn about different types of oriental rugs and textiles
Find repair and cleaning services for oriental rugs
Find accessories and decor items to complement oriental rugs

subcategories.label: Persian Rugs
subcategories.description: Handmade rugs from Iran, known for intricate designs and high quality materials.

subcategories.label: Turkish Rugs
subcategories.description: Handmade rugs from Turkey, known for bold colors and geometric designs.

subcategories.label: Other Oriental Rugs
subcategories.description: Handmade rugs from other regions, including India, Pakistan, Afghanistan, and China.

subcategories.label: Textiles and Accessories
subcategories.description: Textiles and accessories that complement oriental rugs, including cushions, footstools, and lanterns.

subcategories.label: Rug Repair and Cleaning
subcategories.description: Services for repairing and cleaning oriental rugs.
